name: Codes for Borderlands 3
description: This is an unofficial app for Borderlands 3.  Get the latest Shift Codes for Borderlands 3.  Use SHiFT- and VIP-Codes for points, golden keys and skins.  Features:  - An automatic Updater looks for newly changed codes. - You can easily copy codes and redeem them on included links to Borderlands VIP / Shift website. - Integrated Webview for community-based code sources.  PRO Features:  - Notification on new codes [BETA] - No Ads - Mark used codes.    This app is not affiliated with Gearbox or 2K.
